00034 #ifndef HARPS_INPUT_SIMPLE
00035 #define HARPS_INPUT_SIMPLE

00044 
00045 #define NL( name ) \
00046   ( ( name ) * ( 60.0 / tempo ) )
00047 
00048 #define N32 \
00049   NL( 0.125 )
00050 
00051 #define N16 \
00052   NL( 0.25 )
00053 
00054 #define N8 \
00055   NL( 0.5 )
00056 
00057 #define N4 \
00058   NL( 1.0 )
00059 
00060 #define N2 \
00061   NL( 2.0 )
00062 
00063 #define N1 \
00064   NL( 4.0 )

00066 namespace harps {
00070   namespace input {
00074     struct Score {
00078       double pos;
00082       float length;
00086       unsigned int note;
00090       float touch;
00091     };
00092 
00096     template< typename InstrumentType >
00097     class SimpleReader {
00098       public:
00103         SimpleReader ( const Score * const _score ) : score ( _score ), current_score ( _score ), is_end ( false ) {}
00107         virtual ~SimpleReader() {}
00112         template< typename SampleType >
00113         void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer ) {
00114           if ( is_end ) {
00115             fillZero ( _buffer );
00116             return;
00117           }
00118           double time = instrument.getGlobalTime();
00119           while ( !release_stack.empty() && time - release_stack.top().first >= -0.00001f ) {
00120             instrument.noteOff ( release_stack.top().second );
00121             release_stack.pop();
00122           }
00123           while ( time - current_score->pos >= -0.00001f ) {
00124             if ( current_score->length == 0.0f ) {
00125               is_end = true;
00126               fillZero ( _buffer );
00127               return;
00128             }
00129             else {
00130               std::pair< double, int > temp;
00131               temp.first = current_score->pos + current_score->length;
00132               temp.second = instrument.noteOn ( current_score->note, exp2f ( ( current_score->touch - 1.0f ) * 10.0f ) );
00133               release_stack.push ( temp );
00134             }
00135             current_score++;
00136           }
00137           instrument ( _buffer );
00138         }
00143         inline bool isEnd() const {
00144           return is_end;
00145         }
00150         void programChange ( const char *_filename ) {
00151           instrument.programChange ( _filename );
00152         }
00153       private:
00154         template< typename SampleType >
00155         void fillZero ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer ) {
00156           typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00157           int sample_index;
00158           for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00159             raw_buffer[ sample_index ] = 0.0f;
00160         }
00161         InstrumentType instrument;
00162         std::stack< std::pair< double, int > > release_stack;
00163         const Score *current_score;
00164         const Score * const score;
00165         bool is_end;
00166     };
00167 
00171     template< typename OutputType, typename ReaderType, typename BufferType, unsigned int track_count >
00172     class Tracks {
00173       public:
00178         Tracks ( const char *_sink ) : output ( _sink ) {}
00179         void setScore ( unsigned int _target, const char *_prog, const harps::input::Score *_score ) {
00180           readers[ _target ].reset ( new ReaderType ( _score ) );
00181           readers[ _target ]->programChange ( _prog );
00182           buffers[ _target ].reset ( new BufferType );
00183         }
00187         void operator() () {
00188           tbb::parallel_for ( tbb::blocked_range< unsigned int > ( 0, track_count, 1 ),
00189                          TrackRunner ( readers, buffers ) );
00190           BufferType sum;
00191           Buffer< float >::SampleType *sum_raw = sum.get();
00192           unsigned int sample_index;
00193           for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00194             sum_raw[ sample_index ] = 0.0;
00195           unsigned int track_index;
00196           for ( track_index = 0; track_index != track_count; track_index++ ) {
00197             if ( buffers[ track_index ] ) {
00198               Buffer< float >::SampleType *buffer_raw = buffers[ track_index ]->get();
00199               for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00200                 sum_raw[ sample_index ] += buffer_raw[ sample_index ];
00201             }
00202           }
00203           BufferType nlevel;
00204           Buffer< float >::SampleType *nlevel_raw = nlevel.get();
00205           for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ ) {
00206             normalizer.setValue ( sum_raw[ sample_index ] );
00207             nlevel_raw[ sample_index ] = normalizer.getAmp();
00208           }
00209           reduceNormalizingNoize ( nlevel );
00210           for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00211             sum_raw[ sample_index ] /= nlevel_raw[ sample_index ];
00212           output ( sum/*, SAMPLE_COUNT*/ );
00213         }
00218         bool isEnd() {
00219           unsigned int track_index;
00220           for ( track_index = 0; track_index != track_count; track_index++ )
00221             if ( readers[ track_index ] )
00222               return readers[ track_index ]->isEnd();
00223         }
00224       private:
00225         class TrackRunner {
00226           public:
00227             TrackRunner ( boost::array< boost::shared_ptr< ReaderType >, track_count > &_readers,
00228                           boost::array< boost::shared_ptr< BufferType >, track_count > &_buffers )
00229                 : readers ( _readers ), buffers ( _buffers ) {}
00230             void operator() ( const tbb::blocked_range<unsigned int> &_r ) const {
00231               unsigned int index;
00232               for ( index = _r.begin(); index != _r.end(); index++ ) {
00233                 if ( readers[ index ] )
00234                   ( *readers[ index ] ) ( *buffers[ index ] );
00235               }
00236             }
00237           private:
00238             boost::array< boost::shared_ptr< ReaderType >, track_count > &readers;
00239             boost::array< boost::shared_ptr< BufferType >, track_count > &buffers;
00240         };
00241         OutputType output;
00242         harps::Normalizer< SAMPLING_RATE * 10 > normalizer;
00243         boost::array< boost::shared_ptr< ReaderType >, track_count > readers;
00244         boost::array< boost::shared_ptr< BufferType >, track_count > buffers;
00245     };
00246   }
00247 }
